nl_query: Which country had the gas station that sold the most expensive product id No.2 for one unit?
golden_query: SELECT T2.Country FROM transactions_1k AS T1 INNER JOIN gasstations AS T2 ON T1.GasStationID = T2.GasStationID WHERE T1.ProductID = 2 ORDER BY T1.Price DESC LIMIT 1
sparksql_query: SELECT T2.Country FROM transactions_1k AS T1 INNER JOIN gasstations AS T2 ON T1.GasStationID = T2.GasStationID WHERE T1.ProductID = 2 ORDER BY T1.Price / T1.Amount DESC LIMIT 1

execution_plans.golden_query:
Execution Plan for: Golden Query ID 1532...
================================================================================

1. Logical plan:
----------------------------------------
'GlobalLimit 1
+- 'LocalLimit 1
   +- 'Sort ['T1.Price DESC NULLS LAST], true
      +- 'Project ['T2.Country]
         +- 'Filter ('T1.ProductID = 2)
            +- 'Join Inner, ('T1.GasStationID = 'T2.GasStationID)
               :- 'SubqueryAlias T1
               :  +- 'UnresolvedRelation [transactions_1k], [], false
               +- 'SubqueryAlias T2
                  +- 'UnresolvedRelation [gasstations], [], false

+- LocalLimit 1

      +- Sort [Price#9557 DESC NULLS LAST], true

            +- Join Inner, (GasStationID#9554 = GasStationID#9543)
               :- Project [GasStationID#9554, Price#9557]
               :  +- Filter ((isnotnull(ProductID#9555) AND (ProductID#9555 = 2)) AND isnotnull(GasStationID#9554))

               +- Project [GasStationID#9543, Country#9545]
                  +- Filter isnotnull(GasStationID#9543)
                     +- Relation [GasStationID#9543,ChainID#9544,Country#9545,Segment#9546] JDBCRelation((SELECT "GasStationID", "ChainID", "Country", "Segment" FROM "gasstations") AS "gasstations") [numPartitions=1]
